QuestData.Title: A Worthy Challenge: Durand
QuestData.Description: $n, I need you to assemble a stout group and lead them into Scarlet Monastery. Activate the Challenger's Orb therein, and smite Durand with righteous fury.$B$BReturn to me when you've completed this challenge, and I shall reward you handsomely.
QuestData.LogDescription: Complete the Scarlet Monastery Challenge Mode.

Objectives.Objective: Complete the Scarlet Monastery Challenge Mode
